title: Spiritual Intelligence's Role in Reducing Technostress through Ethical Work Climates. (arXiv:2401.03658v1 [econ.GN])
abstract: This study explores the impact of spiritual intelligence (SI) on technostress, with a focus on the mediating role of the ethical environment. In an era where technological advancements continually reshape our work and personal lives, understanding the interplay between human intelligence, well-being, and ethics within organizations is increasingly significant. Spiritual intelligence, transcending traditional cognitive and emotional intelligences, emphasizes understanding personal meaning and values. This paper investigates how higher levels of SI enable individuals to integrate technology into their lives without undue stress, and how a robust ethical environment within organizations supports and amplifies these benefits. Through a comprehensive review of literature, empirical research, and detailed analysis, the study highlights the protective role of SI against technostress and the significant influence of an ethical climate in enhancing this effect. translated_title: 精神智力在通过道德工作氛围减轻技术压力中的作用
translated_abstract: 本研究探讨了精神智力（SI）对技术压力的影响，重点关注道德环境的中介作用。在技术不断重塑我们的工作和个人生活的时代，理解人类智力、幸福和组织内部道德之间的相互作用变得越来越重要。精神智力超越传统的认知和情绪智力，强调理解个人意义和价值观。本文研究了较高水平的精神智力如何使个体在不受过度压力的情况下将技术融入他们的生活，并且较为道德化的环境对于支持和放大这些好处的影响。通过综合文献回顾、实证研究和详细分析，本研究强调了精神智力对于减轻技术压力的保护作用以及道德氛围对于增强这种效果的显著影响。研究结果提供了有价值的洞察。
tldr: 本研究探讨了精神智力在减轻技术压力方面的作用，重点研究了道德环境的中介作用。研究发现，较高水平的精神智力可以帮助个体更好地融入技术并减轻压力，而良好的道德氛围可以支持和放大这些好处。
en_tdlr: This study investigates the role of spiritual intelligence in reducing technostress, with a focus on the mediating role of the ethical environment. The study finds that higher levels of spiritual intelligence enable individuals to better integrate technology and alleviate stress, and a strong ethical climate supports and amplifies these benefits.
